code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{TextField,Button,Box,CircularProgress,Typography,Card}from'@mui/material';import{getAccountData}from'../services/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function SummonerForm(_ref){let{onAccountDataFetched}=_ref;const[gameName,setGameName]=useState('');const[tagLine,setTagLine]=useState('');const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const[error,setError]=useState('');const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setLoading(true);setError('');try{const data=await getAccountData(gameName,tagLine);if(data&&!data.error){onAccountDataFetched(data);}else{setError(data.error||'Error fetching data');}}catch(err){setError('Error fetching account data');}finally{setLoading(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{sx:{bgcolor:'#2d3748',p:4,borderRadius:3,boxShadow:4,display:'flex',flexDirection:'column',alignItems:'center'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{component:"form",onSubmit:handleSubmit,sx:{display:'flex',alignItems:'center',gap:2,width:'100%'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{label:"Game Name",variant:"outlined",value:gameName,onChange:e=>setGameName(e.target.value),required:true,fullWidth:true,InputLabelProps:{style:{color:'#f0f0f0'}},InputProps:{style:{color:'#f0f0f0',backgroundColor:'#3b4252',borderRadius:1}}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{label:"Tag Line",variant:"outlined",value:tagLine,onChange:e=>setTagLine(e.target.value),required:true,fullWidth:true,InputLabelProps:{style:{color:'#f0f0f0'}},InputProps:{style:{color:'#f0f0f0',backgroundColor:'#3b4252',borderRadius:1}}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{type:"submit",variant:"contained",disabled:loading,sx:{bgcolor:'#4a90e2',color:'#fff',minWidth:'150px'},children:loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CircularProgress,{size:24,color:"inherit"}):'Search'})]}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"body2",color:"error",sx:{mt:2},children:error})]});}export default SummonerForm;
